name: Barry Frost
Barry Frost
London #indieweb people: join us at Homebrew Website Club tonight at 6pm in Covent Garden. https://calumryan.com/event/hwc-20161116/ cc @timblair @hobbsy
My MacBook Pro is almost always closed and plugged in to a display. I‚Äôd love to buy a wireless keyboard with TouchID for 1Password/Apple Pay.
Transformative
Colophon
Success rate of my Apple Watch unlocking my MacBook Pro is now in the 90s% üëç

So I‚Äôve been hacking away for a couple of months but I think I‚Äôm almost there with my new personal website/engine. My aim has been to rebuild to support the latest Micropub draft specification, including full edits and deletes/undeletes via JSON, and pass the Micropub.rocks and Webmention.rocks test suites. I‚Äôm now at 100% for both and I suppose all that‚Äôs left is to refactor a tiny bit, import my content, write it up and then push it live. It‚Äôs tempting to keep tinkering but I think I‚Äôll learn more from selfdogfooding and getting it out in the wild.
A friend looking for a project mgmt job for 4 months asked for help from friends on Facebook. Within a week has 3 job offers. Recruitment.
The first @venntrodev ‚ÄúDevOps Friday‚Äù has begun: a day of improving the @wld platform. I‚Äôm learning about #golang to fix a broken tool.
This post has bold and italic text.
Micropub test of creating an h-entry with categories. This post should have two categories, test1 and test2
Micropub test of creating a basic h-entry
Enjoyed and learned something from each of the sessions at #mtpcon today, with ideas to take back to @venntrodev
North Norfolk Notes

Micropub is now a @W3C CR. Congratulations to @aaronpk and all the #indieweb contributors. With this news I‚Äôm excited to see further clients and servers start to emerge. I‚Äôve been using Micropub as the only method of posting to this site since January 2015 but I‚Äôve yet to add in full update/delete capabilities. Time to get hacking.

When your house is on fire you don‚Äôt wait to see if it goes out by itself, you call 999 straight away. ‚Äì @arseblog on Arsenal‚Äôs inaction over Centre Back injuries. Clearly negligent to start the season so unprepared.
England v Pakistan Test Match. Day 2. ‚òÄÔ∏è

Prompted by Calum publishing an indie event page for the next Homebrew Website Club meeting in London, I‚Äôve modified this site to support sending RSVPs. Nice way of prioritising features: wait until you have a use-case before building.
Introducing Webhook Mentions
content:
London #indieweb people: join us at Homebrew Website Club tonight at 6pm in Covent Garden.

https://calumryan.com/event/hwc-20161116/

cc @timblair @hobbsy
My MacBook Pro is almost always closed and plugged in to a display. I‚Äôd love to buy a wireless keyboard with TouchID for 1Password/Apple Pay.

I‚Äôm happy to say this site is now running my new IndieWeb microblogging software, Transformative, which I‚Äôve open-sourced on GitHub.

Read¬†full¬†post‚Ä¶

Transformative is a microblogging engine that powers my personal website barryfrost.com. It‚Äôs written in Ruby and supports several key IndieWeb technologies as detailed below.

Read¬†full¬†post‚Ä¶
Success rate of my Apple Watch unlocking my MacBook Pro is now in the 90s% üëç

So I‚Äôve been hacking away for a couple of months but I think I‚Äôm almost there with my new personal website/engine.

My aim has been to rebuild to support the latest Micropub draft specification, including full edits and deletes/undeletes via JSON, and pass the Micropub.rocks and Webmention.rocks test suites.

I‚Äôm now at 100% for both and I suppose all that‚Äôs left is to refactor a tiny bit, import my content, write it up and then push it live. It‚Äôs tempting to keep tinkering but I think I‚Äôll learn more from selfdogfooding and getting it out in the wild.
A friend looking for a project mgmt job for 4 months asked for help from friends on Facebook. Within a week has 3 job offers. Recruitment.
The first @venntrodev ‚ÄúDevOps Friday‚Äù has begun: a day of improving the @wld platform. I‚Äôm learning about #golang to fix a broken tool.
Micropub test of creating an h-entry with categories. This post should have two categories, test1 and test2
Micropub test of creating a basic h-entry
Enjoyed and learned something from each of the sessions at #mtpcon today, with ideas to take back to @venntrodev

Earlier this week I returned from a very enjoyable holiday in a surprisingly sunny North Norfolk with Laura and 10-month old Henry. For posterity and in case it‚Äôs useful for those with a similarly-aged baby/toddler, here are a few of my highlights.

Read¬†full¬†post‚Ä¶

Micropub is now a @W3C CR. Congratulations to @aaronpk and all the #indieweb contributors.

With this news I‚Äôm excited to see further clients and servers start to emerge. I‚Äôve been using Micropub as the only method of posting to this site since January 2015 but I‚Äôve yet to add in full update/delete capabilities. Time to get hacking.

When your house is on fire you don‚Äôt wait to see if it goes out by itself, you call 999 straight away.

‚Äì @arseblog on Arsenal‚Äôs inaction over Centre Back injuries. Clearly negligent to start the season so unprepared.
England v Pakistan Test Match. Day 2. ‚òÄÔ∏è

Prompted by Calum publishing an indie event page for the next Homebrew Website Club meeting in London, I‚Äôve modified this site to support sending RSVPs.

Nice way of prioritising features: wait until you have a use-case before building.

Webhook Mentions is a very simple Ruby app I‚Äôve built that sends Webmentions to any links in new/updated posts in a Jekyll-powered GitHub Pages site marked up with Microformats 2 h-entry markup.

Read¬†full¬†post‚Ä¶
